metadata.name: BOOGIE BOT 1V
metadata.description:
The Boogie Bot 1V is a unique and expressive piece of art that combines the power and strength of a military battle mech robot with thumping rhythms. This gold and black robot is adorned with intricate details and patterns that give it a playful edge.

But perhaps the most striking feature of the Boogie Bot are its guns, which have been transformed into speakers that blast out good vibes only. As the robot moves and grooves, it shoots out a wave of positive energy and creates thumping rhythms that are sure to inspire viewers to get up and dance.

Overall, the Boogie Bot is a dynamic and eye-catching piece of art that is sure to bring energy to any space. Its playful and expressive design, combined with its powerful and commanding presence, make it a perfect addition to any dance studio, music venue, or home.
